Paaster is a secure and user-friendly pastebin application that prioritizes privacy and simplicity. With end-to-end encryption and paste history, Paaster ensures that your pasted code remains confidential and accessible.

Simple, Encrypted Budgets & Expenses. Take back control of your budgets and expenses in a simple way, achieve piece of mind, and maintain control of your data. This is the PWA/Web app for Budget Zen (frontend and backend / serverful).
